movie.title: The Reckoning
movie.description_intro: Katie Lapp, now Katherine Mayfield, has inherited her biological mother's huge estate. But her new world is rocked when her former Amish love, Daniel Fisher reveals he is alive. But Katie chooses the head of the foundation to marry. What will Daniel do, and will Katie ' s Amish parents attend her wedding, against the Ordnung's rules?
movie.description_full: Katie Lapp, now Katherine Mayfield, has inherited her biological mother's huge estate. But her new world is rocked when her former Amish love, Daniel Fisher reveals he is alive. But Katie chooses the head of the foundation to marry. What will Daniel do, and will Katie ' s Amish parents attend her wedding, against the Ordnung's rules?

movies.title: Chicago Massacre: Richard Speck
movies.summary: Richard Speck lives in the Dallas, Texas area, and is a seemingly quiet but string man. After divorcing his wife, and to escape the mental evaluation treatment a judge had ordered for him, he leaves Texas and moves to Chicago, where the hell will start.

movies.title: The Last Cartridge, an Incident of the Sepoy Rebellion in India
movies.title_english: The Last Cartridge, an Incident of the Sepoy Rebellion in India
movies.title_long: The Last Cartridge, an Incident of the Sepoy Rebellion in India (1908)
movies.summary: Caught off-guard by Indian mutineers, a British soldier saves his last bullet for his daughter lest she be taken. This silent film features an original, scene-specific piano score compiled from period appropriate photoplay music.
movies.description_full: Caught off-guard by Indian mutineers, a British soldier saves his last bullet for his daughter lest she be taken. This silent film features an original, scene-specific piano score compiled from period appropriate photoplay music.

movies.title: Diggers
movies.summary: A story about a tight-knit group of friends, who try to maintain their small-town way of life in the face of enormous changes in 1970s Long Island.
movies.description_full: A story about a tight-knit group of friends, who try to maintain their small-town way of life in the face of enormous changes in 1970s Long Island.
movies.synopsis: A story about a tight-knit group of friends, who try to maintain their small-town way of life in the face of enormous changes in 1970s Long Island.

movies.title: The Towering Inferno
movies.summary: Doug Roberts, Architect, returns from a long vacation to find work nearly completed on his skyscraper. He goes to the party that night concerned he's found that his wiring specifications have not been followed and that the building continues to develop short circuits. When the fire begins, Michael O'Halleran is the chief on duty as a series of daring rescues punctuate the terror of a building too tall to have a fire successfully fought from the ground.
